DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis Parkinson 's disease ( case subject diagnose presence least three five follow primary sign : rest tremor , bradykinesia , rigidity , impaired postural reflux , presence sustain Ldopa response . ) Healthy volunteer without Parkinson 's disease Cases show atypical feature , include multiple system atrophy progressive supranuclear gaze palsy , secondary cause Parkinsonism , neuroleptic drug , infection , tumor , previous cerebrovascular accident know toxin
